markdown.markdown:
Hi! :wave:
I am Motion Graphics Designer :clapper: experienced in animation :boom:, branding :art:, production :tophat:, games :video_game:, and UI/UX design :computer:. I create awesome motion graphics for TV, marketing, and social media. Besides that I am a universe lover always eager to learn new cool stuff and grow my skills!
I am originally from Ukraine, but have travelled the world since 2014 and gained experience working for variety of companies in different markets across 2 continents. Now I live in Vancouver area of beautiful BC, Canada. :bear: 3AG Systems | Lead Graphic Designer | Burnaby, BC :canada: | 2021 - present mimik Technologies Inc | Graphic Designer | Vancouver, BC :canada: | 2021 - 2021 Wawybrain Studios LLC | Animator/Illustrator | Albuquerque, NM :us: | 2020 - 2021 REELZ TV | Motion Graphics Designer | Albuquerque, NM :us: | 2018 - 2020 Universal Phoenix Group | 3D Animator | Atlanta, GA :us:| 2017 - 2017 RightBrain Training | Graphic Designer | Kyiv :ukraine: | 2014 - 2017 ## Skills Motion Graphics | Graphic Design | Adobe Creative Suite | 2D/2.5/3D animation | Styling | Branding and visual identity | Print production/prepress | Tracking | Rotoscoping | UI/UX design (both mobile/desktop) | Typography | Layout | Color | Composition ## Software Adobe Creative Suite: Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere Pro, InDesign, XD, etc 3D modelling and animation: Cinema 4D, Red Giant, Autodesk Maya, Blender, Zbrush Other: Figma, Unreal Engine, HTML/CSS, Midjourney, BlueWillow ## Education MSc in Computer Graphics and Design | Step IT Academy | Donetsk, Ukraine MSc in Biology | Donetsk National University | Donetsk, Ukraine
